p: A fine powder (1 g) of G. lucidum was extracted with 40 mL of 95% ethanol for 6 h at 30C with gentle shaking in a 150 mL flask. The flask was sealed with aluminum foil during the extraction. The extraction procedure was repeated once. The extraction solution was centrifuged at 8000 Ã— g for 10 min. The supernatants were combined, and used for measurement of triterpenoids and the assay of antioxidant activity.
